title: Ijaz Shah urges nation to follow health guidelines on Eid-ul-Azha to prevent Covid-19 spread
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 1 (APP):Interior Minister Syed Ijaz Ahmed Shah Saturday urged the nation to ensure following standard operating procedure (SOPs) and health guidelines to prevent the spread of Covid-19 pandemic on the festive occasion of Eid-ul-Azha.
In his Eid-ul-Azha message, the minister said the cases of Covid-19 have registered a significant decrease and people should remain extra conscious over Eid-ul-Azha to keep the pandemic spread in check.
The nation should celebrate Eid-ul-Azha with simplicity and cooperate with the government in containing the pandemic to keep each other and our communitiesâ€™ safe as the pathogen can be defeated with joint efforts. He said the government was trying utmost to overcome the pandemic
